keel.Algorithms.Neural_Networks.NNEP_Common.neuralnet

Class LinkedLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Neural_Networks.NNEP_Common.neuralnet.LinkedLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILayer<LinkedNeuron>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExpLayer, LinearLayer, SigmLayer

    public abstract class LinkedLayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILayer<LinkedNeuron>

    Since:
    JDK1.5

    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Written by Pedro Antonio Gutierrez Penya, Aaron Ruiz Mora (University of Cordoba) 17/07/2007

      protected int type
      Type of layer (HIDDEN_LAYER or OUTPUT_LAYER)
      protected static <any> XML
      Marshal/Unmarshal initial number of neurons, maximum number of neurons, each neuron, layer type, weigth range, and a boolean indicating if the layer is input-biased
